readme: # Pane Full Info _Pane Info_ is a package for Atom, which shows the filepath of each pane. This plugin is useful for those of us who keep their tabs hidden. ![Pane Info Screenshot](https://github.com/dwillie/atom-pane-info/raw/master/screenshot.png) ## Features * Highlights current pane in blue ## Installation Simply run the following command: ```sh apm install pane-full-info ``` Or find the package in **Atom** → **Settings** → **Install** and search for "**pane-full-info**" a fork of [pane-info](https://github.com/sberan/atom-pane-info)
